title: SoulMate
description: A modern and secure matrimonial platform where users can create detailed biodata, explore matches, and share marriage success stories. The platform offers a premium membership system and personalized dashboards for a smooth experience.
features: Create and manage biodata with role-based access (User/Admin)
Send, approve, and track contact requests with premium visibility
Share and browse marriage success stories with reviews and images

title: Service Review System
description: A full-featured review platform where users can explore services, leave ratings, and manage personal feedback. Built with secure authentication and a responsive, interactive UI.
features: Users can leave reviews and star ratings for services
User dashboard showing personal services and reviews
Responsive UI for mobile and desktop devices
Filter/search services by category or name

title: Recipe Book
description: A visually-rich and interactive recipe-sharing platform designed for both beginners and seasoned cooks. Users can browse, upload, and manage recipes through a personalized dashboard with smooth animations and a delightful UI experience.
features: Explore categorized dishes including Bachelor’s Meals and Beginner special
Like and interact with other users’ recipes (excluding own)
Detailed recipe view with ingredients, instructions, and cooking info
Responsive UI with image sliders, hover effects, and tooltips
Search and filter functionality across public recipe catalog
